name: El Starter Pack 2.0
detailed_description:
For a fun start on your Elsword adventures, the El Starter Pack has the basics covered! Elsword Online’s El Starter Pack contains 3x Ice Burners, 1x EXP Boost Medal (50%, 7days), and 1x Black Star Hena Accessory. Get $15 value for less with this special Steam pack!

  • 3 Ice Burners - Melt a Sealed Ice Sculpture and reveal its coveted contents. You could find useful items or a piece of the currently featured costume set. Whatever you find, it will always be top-notch. (Sealed Ice Sculptures are crafted in-game.)

  • 1 EXP Boost Medal (50%, 7days) - Keep this in your specific character’s inventory to gain 50% extra experience points. It disappears from your inventory after 7 days.

  • 1 Black Star Hena - A star on your face is quite the fashion statement. This accessory gives you the following stats +113 Critical.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 2000
  • Processor:Pentium 3 800MHZ
  • Memory:256 MB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce MX 400(32M)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:1300 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP
  • Processor:Pentium 4 2.7 GHZ
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce FX5700/ATI Radeon 9600(128M)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
